Projects

Here are some things that I've worked on, mostly game-related, but not all.

Games

  • Little Suzie: An abstract game designed to look at how game mechanics influence player emotion and narrative (undergraduate independent study).
  • Koan: A series of minigames aimed at being a collection of playable zen koans (playable media course project).
  • Smokin’ Pizza: An absurdist game about a pizza delivery truck (global game jam 2018).

Creative Writing

  • From my undergraduate creative writing course:
    • Setting Sketch
    • Character Sketch
    • Plot Skecth
    • Dialogue Sketch
    • Short Story

Other

  • Scholars Play: Join me and other graduate students as we stream games and do live criticism every Friday at 4:30pm (PST).
  • @childrensjokes: twitter bot that writes absurd, nonsensical jokes (procjam 2018).
